entry.def: If you snicker, you laugh quietly in a disrespectful way, for example at something rude or embarrassing.

example.ex: We all snickered at Mrs. Swenson.
example.tran: 我们都暗暗嘲笑斯温森太太。

auth_sentence.content: I have seen the eternal Footman hold my coat, and snicker, And in short, I was afraid.
